briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Challenge Study of Live Oral Cholera Vaccine Candidate,PXVX0200, to Prevent Cholera

outcomeMeasures.title: % of Participants With Moderate to Severe Diarrhea
outcomeMeasures.description: Determine whether a single dose of PXVX0200 provides significantly greater protection than placebo against a challenge with virulent V. cholerae O1 El Tor Inaba at 10 days after vaccination. The primary endpoint was the occurrence of moderate or severe (\>/= 3 liters) diarrhea.

outcomeMeasures.title: % of Participants With Moderate to Severe Diarrhea
outcomeMeasures.description: Determine whether a single dose of PXVX0200 provides significant greater protection than placebo against a challenge with virulent V. cholerae O1 El Tor Inaba at 3 months after vaccination. The primary endpoint was the occurrence of moderate or severe (\>/= 3 liters) of diarrhea.

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Weight of Diarrheal Stools Following the 10 Day Cholera Challenge
outcomeMeasures.description: Total weight (converted to volume) per subject of diarrheal stools measured from subjects with diarrhea following the 10 day cholera challenge.

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Weight of Diarrheal Stools Following the 90 Day Cholera Challenge
outcomeMeasures.description: Total weight (converted to volume) per subject of diarrheal stools measured from subjects with diarrhea following the 90 day cholera challenge.

outcomeMeasures.title: % of Participants With Diarrhea of Any Severity Following a 10 Day Cholera Challenge
outcomeMeasures.description: Incidence of mild or worse (any severity) diarrhea following the 10 day cholera challenge.

outcomeMeasures.title: % of Participants With Diarrhea of Any Severity Following a 90 Day Challenge
outcomeMeasures.description: Incidence of mild or worse (any severity) diarrhea following the 90 day cholera challenge.

outcomeMeasures.title: % of Participants With Fever Following the 10 Day Cholera Challenge
outcomeMeasures.description: Incidence of mild or worse fever following the 10 day cholera challenge.

outcomeMeasures.title: % of Participants With Fever Following the 90 Day Cholera Challenge
outcomeMeasures.description: Incidence of mild or worse fever following the 90 day cholera challenge.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Days With Fecal Shedding Following 10 Day Challenge
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of days of fecal shedding of wild type V. cholerae following 10 Day Challenge.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Days With Fecal Shedding Following 90 Day Challenge
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of days of fecal shedding of wild type V. cholerae following 90 Day Challenge

outcomeMeasures.title: # of Days With Positive Stool Culture Following 10 Day Cholera Challenge
outcomeMeasures.description: Total number of days with a positive stool culture following the 10 Day Cholera challenge.

outcomeMeasures.title: # of Days With Positive Stool Culture Following 90 Day Cholera Challenge
outcomeMeasures.description: Total number of days with a positive stool culture following 90 Day Cholera Challenge

outcomeMeasures.title: % of Participants With Reactogenicity, Diarrhea, Fever or Unsolicited Adverse Events Following Vaccination
outcomeMeasures.description:
Incidence and severity of signs and symptoms of reactogenicity such as diarrhea, and fever following vaccination (through Day 8).

Incidence and severity of unsolicited adverse events following vaccination (through Day 29).
